results.title: Eddie Izzard: Circle
results.brief_description: Town Hall, New York City, 26 June 2000. An evening with Eddie Izzard in which he moves back and forth in time, with religion as the loose but constant theme.

constellations_other.name: Stop-motion fantasies
constellations_other.description: The LEGO Movie draws on fan-made stop-motion films for its aesthetic style, but fantastical animation comes in many forms.

results.description: Town Hall, New York City, 26 June 2000. An evening with Eddie Izzard in which he moves back and forth in time, with religion as the loose but constant theme.

results.title: Eat Pray Love
results.creator_credit: Jennifer Salt, Bill Groom, Red Om Films, Columbia Pictures, Plan B Entertainment, Dede Gardner, Michael Dennison and Ryan Murphy
results.brief_description: Liz Gilbert had everything a modern woman is supposed to dream of having – a husband, a house and a successful career – yet like so many others, she found herself lost, confused and searching for what she really wanted in life.

constellations_other.name: Film and TV dreams
constellations_other.description: Fleetwood Mac's 'Dreams' coasted its way back up the charts 40 years after it was first released, thanks to Nathan Apodaca's joyous viral TikTok, but Fleetwood Mac (and Stevie Knicks) have been main staples of screen culture for decades.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Jennifer Salt, Bill Groom, Red Om Films, Columbia Pictures, Plan B Entertainment, Dede Gardner, Michael Dennison and Ryan Murphy
results.description: Liz Gilbert had everything a modern woman is supposed to dream of having – a husband, a house and a successful career – yet like so many others, she found herself lost, confused and searching for what she really wanted in life. Newly divorced and at a crossroads, Gilbert steps out of her comfort zone, risking everything to change her life, embarking on a journey around the world that becomes a quest for self-discovery. In her travels, she discovers the true pleasure of nourishment by eating in Italy, the power of prayer in India and, finally and unexpectedly, the inner peace and balance of true love in Bali.
description_for_label: Liz Gilbert had everything a modern woman is supposed to dream of having – a husband, a house and a successful career – yet like so many others, she found herself lost, confused and searching for what she really wanted in life. Newly divorced and at a crossroads, Gilbert steps out of her comfort zone, risking everything to change her life, embarking on a journey around the world that becomes a quest for self-discovery. In her travels, she discovers the true pleasure of nourishment by eating in Italy, the power of prayer in India and, finally and unexpectedly, the inner peace and balance of true love in Bali.

results.title: Dunkirk
results.creator_credit: Jeffrey Kurland, Cesha Ventre, RatPac Entertainment, Ciné+, Kaap Holland Film, Dombey Street Productions, Syncopy, Warner Bros. Pictures, Canal+, Christopher Nolan, Emma Thomas, Nathan Crowley and Ben Cowell-Thomas
results.headline_credit: France, Netherlands, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2017
results.brief_description: The story of the miraculous evacuation of Allied soldiers from Belgium, Britain, Canada and France, who were cut off and surrounded by the German army from the beaches and harbour of Dunkirk between May 26th and June 4th 1940 during World War II.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jeffrey Kurland, Cesha Ventre, RatPac Entertainment, Ciné+, Kaap Holland Film, Dombey Street Productions, Syncopy, Warner Bros. Pictures, Canal+, Christopher Nolan, Emma Thomas, Nathan Crowley and Ben Cowell-Thomas

results.title: Driving Miss Daisy
results.creator_credit: Alfred Uhry, Robert Doudell, Lili Fini Zanuck, Bruno Rubeo, Elizabeth McBride, Richard D. Zanuck, Bruce Beresford, John P. Mesa, The Zanuck Company, Majestic Films International and Warner Bros. Pictures
results.brief_description: The story of an old Jewish widow named Daisy Werthan and her relationship with her black chauffeur, Hoke. From an initial mere work relationship grew in 25 years a strong friendship between the two very different characters in a time when those types of relationships where shunned.

constellations_other.name: Fred Schepisi
constellations_other.description: Fred Schepisi's diverse body of work connects to acclaimed local productions, westerns and Hollywood favourites.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Alfred Uhry, Robert Doudell, Lili Fini Zanuck, Bruno Rubeo, Elizabeth McBride, Richard D. Zanuck, Bruce Beresford, John P. Mesa, The Zanuck Company, Majestic Films International and Warner Bros. Pictures

results.title: Drifters
results.brief_description: The only film ever directed personally by John Grierson, this documentary was made for the Empire Marketing Board about the men on the British herring fleets, which employed montage and documentary techniques to demonstrate the human side of the fishing industry.

constellations_primary.name: Reconstructing reality
constellations_primary.description: While documentary pertains to be about the truth, many filmmakers and artists have used ingenious reconstructions to represent an abstracted honesty.

results.description: A silent film by John Grierson. It tells the story of Britain’s North Sea herring fishery.
description_for_label: A silent film by John Grierson. It tells the story of Britain’s North Sea herring fishery.

results.title: Drawing Restraint 9
results.brief_description: The film concerns the theme of self-imposed limitation and continues Matthew Barney’s interest in religious rite, this time focusing on Shinto
results.description: The film concerns the theme of self-imposed limitation and continues Matthew Barney’s interest in religious rite, this time focusing on Shinto

results.title: Dracula
results.creator_credit: Universal Pictures, Louis Bromfield, Vera West, Garrett Fort, Tod Browning, E. M. Asher, Carl Laemmle Jr., Ed Ware, John Hoffman, Louis Stevens and Herman Rosse
results.brief_description: British estate agent Renfield travels to Transylvania to meet with the mysterious Count Dracula, who is interested in leasing a castle in London and is, unbeknownst to Renfield, a vampire. After Dracula enslaves Renfield and drives him to insanity, the pair sail to London together, and as Dracula begins preying on London socialites, the two become the subject of study for a supernaturalist professor, Abraham Van Helsing.

constellations_other.name: Monsters, murder and mystery
constellations_other.description: Murder and mystery hide in the shadows born from German Expressionism.

results.title: Downton Abbey
results.creator_credit: Carnival Films & Television, ITV Studios and Carnival Films
results.brief_description: A chronicle of the lives of the aristocratic Crawley family and their servants in the post-Edwardian era—with great events in history having an effect on their lives and on the British social hierarchy.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Carnival Films & Television, ITV Studios and Carnival Films
results.description: A chronicle of the lives of the aristocratic Crawley family and their servants in the post-Edwardian era—with great events in history having an effect on their lives and on the British social hierarchy.

results.title: Downton Abbey
results.creator_credit: Liz Trubridge, Julian Fellowes, Michael Engler, Donal Woods, Gareth Neame, Focus Features, Carnival Films & Television, Perfect World Pictures, Carnival Films and Anna Mary Scott Robbins
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2019
results.brief_description: The beloved Crawleys and their intrepid staff prepare for the most important moment of their lives. A royal visit from the King and Queen of England will unleash scandal, romance and intrigue that will leave the future of Downton hanging in the balance.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Liz Trubridge, Julian Fellowes, Michael Engler, Donal Woods, Gareth Neame, Focus Features, Carnival Films & Television, Perfect World Pictures, Carnival Films and Anna Mary Scott Robbins

results.title: Don Juan
results.brief_description: Don Juan is a 1926 American romantic adventure film directed by Alan Crosland and starring John Barrymore. It is the first feature-length film to utilise the Vitaphone sound-on-disc sound system with a synchronised musical score and sound effects, though it has no spoken dialogue.

constellations_other.name: Sound and Hollywood
constellations_other.description: The impact of sound on Tinsel Town stretches from the beginning of cinema to recent award-winners, as well as the biggest band in K-Pop.

results.description: If there was one thing that Don Juan de Marana learned from his father Don Jose, it was that women gave you three things - life, disillusionment and death. In his father’s case it was his wife, Donna Isobel, and Donna Elvira who supplied the latter. Don Juan settled in Rome after attending the University of Pisa. Rome was run by the tyrannical Borgia family consisting of Caesar, Lucrezia and the Count Donati. Juan has his way with and was pursued by many women, but it is the one that he could not have that haunts him. It will be for her that he suffers the wrath of Borgia for ignoring Lucrezia and then killing Count Donati in a duel. For Adriana, they will both be condemned to death in the prison on the river Tigre.
description_for_label: If there was one thing that Don Juan de Marana learned from his father Don Jose, it was that women gave you three things - life, disillusionment and death. Rome was run by the tyrannical Borgia family consisting of Caesar, Lucrezia and the Count Donati.
